data.actual_result: Improper scaling occurs, leading to panels and the exit button being off
data.expected_result: The overlay scales correctly, the panels are moved and the exit overlay button is in the upper right corner
data.short_description: Starting a game windowed and fullscreening said game causes overlay to improperly scale
data.steps_to_repro: - Launch a game that launches windowed by default (ex: Minecraft - Ensure the game launches and open the overlay - Maximize the window - Reopen overlay - Observe
